channel.title: Monsterhearts 2: Inconvenienced (Saturdays in January)
channel.description:
Young shift workers in the graveyard hours of Shop Smart!
Shop Smart is a big-box store just outside of town. A strange town, with strange customers - but that's okay, Shop Smart has some strange employees!
A limited selection of Skins is available for the players (as per the usual Small Town setups) Harpy, Hollow, Infernal, Mortal, Queen, Wyrm; though other Skins are possible if the players want to branch out.
*Media Touchstones:* Clerks, Go, Super Store
![ShopSmart1(GO)|600x440](upload://y6LXt8IHn1P6XxhFSQuOhdQRCZD.jpeg)
**Content Warning**: Teenage Monsters, Bad Managers & Worse Customers, Shiftwork System: PbtA **Duration**: Four 3-hour sessions **Breaks**: One 10-15 minute break in the middle (but more if required) **Venue**: Facilitator's Zoom **Recording**: Yes, but made public only with all players' enthusiastic consent! **Attendance:** Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety**: Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door Policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
*RSVPs open to all from 13th November at 1pm (GMT)*
